UPDATE emr_quality_aging
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
emr_code = #{emrCode},
tips_type = #{tipsType},
datum_time = #{datumTime},
time_out = #{timeOut},
advice_list = #{adviceList},
is_valid = #{isValid},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
WHERE hosp_code =#{hospCode} and id =#{id}
mapper.select:
select a.id,a.hosp_code, emr_code,tips_type,datum_time,time_out,advice_list,a.is_valid,a.crte_id,a.crte_name,a.crte_time, CONCAT(b.`name`,'提醒时间：(',a.time_out,'小时)') as label,b.name as emrName from emr_quality_aging a LEFT JOIN emr_classify b on a.emr_code = b.`code` and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and (b.dept_id is null or b.dept_id = '') where a.hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and (emr_code like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select a.code as id,a.name as label,a.up_code as parentId ,if(a.is_end >0,true,false) as isEnd,b.id as templateId, a.valid_time as validTime, b.dept_id from emr_classify as a left join emr_classify_template as b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.code = b.classify_code and IFNULL(a.dept_id,'') = IFNULL(b.dept_id,'') where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_valid = '1' and a.dept_id is null and a.up_code !='EMR'

select a.id,a.hosp_code, emr_code,tips_type,datum_time,time_out,advice_list,a.is_valid,a.crte_id,a.crte_name,a.crte_time, CONCAT(b.`name`,'提醒时间：(',a.time_out,'小时)') as label,b.name as emrName from emr_quality_aging a LEFT JOIN emr_classify b on a.emr_code = b.`code` and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and (b.dept_id is null or b.dept_id = '') where a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and a.id = #{id}
and (emr_code like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select a.id,a.hosp_code, emr_code,tips_type,datum_time,time_out,advice_list,a.is_valid,a.crte_id,a.crte_name,a.crte_time, CONCAT(b.`name`,'提醒时间：(',a.time_out,'小时)') as label,b.name as emrName from emr_quality_aging a LEFT JOIN emr_classify b on a.emr_code = b.`code` and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and (b.dept_id is null or b.dept_id = '') where a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and b.code = #{emrCode}
